stable.changelog:
- (NEW) Animated icon splash screen (Android 12+)
- (NEW) Support to themed icon (Android 13)
- (NEW) Use SAF implementation for acess SD card in add folder option (available in album settings)
- (FIX) Video loading when restart by button
- (FIX) Translucid theme glitches in Android 12/13
- (FIX) AVI format crashes
- (INT) Do not request storage read access when manage all files is required
- (INT) Adjust monet themes colors
- (INT) Use md3 actionbar padding and remove shadow
- (INT) Merge translations
- (INT) Small improvements and fixes

beta.changelog:
- (REVERT) drop nav drawer and move to menu
- (INT) Translations updates
